entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
